analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba /
translated: The Song of the Vajra of MahƒÅmudrƒÅ

original: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious lord ≈öavaripa.

original: na mo dharma k'a ya /
analyzed: na mo dharma k'a ya /
translated: Homage to the dharmakƒÅya.

original: ma h'a su kha ye /
analyzed: ma h'a su kha ye /
translated: Homage to MahƒÅsukha.

original: kye ho gnyis med rdo rje 'di ltar nyon //
analyzed: kye ho gnyis med rdo rje 'di ltar nyon //
translated: Kye ho! Listen, O nondual vajra, in this way:

original: gang zhig mig med pa yis lam mkhan bsten //
analyzed: gang zhig mig med pa yis lam mkhan bsten //
translated: Those who rely on a guide even though they have no eyes

original: bu chung dpa' bo ma la rag lus te //
analyzed: bu chung dpa' bo ma la rag lus te //
translated: Are young heroes dependent on their mothers.

original: me long bstan pas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal //
analyzed: me long bstan pas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal //
translated: The face‚Äôs ma·πá·∏çala is illuminated by showing a mirror.

original: ngang pa'i mchu yis chu dang 'o ma 'byed //
analyzed: ngang pa'i mchu yis chu dang 'o ma 'byed //
translated: Geese separate water and milk with their beaks.

original: bskal pa'i mun pa sel byed sgron me ste //
analyzed: bskal pa'i mun pa sel byed sgron me ste //
translated: The lamp dispels the darkness of the eon.üîΩThe supreme key that opens the treasure house

original: gter gyi bang mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig mchog / mi zad gter chen 'byin pa'i rgyal po bsten //
analyzed: gter gyi bang mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig mchog / mi zad gter chen 'byin pa'i rgyal po bsten //
translated: Is the king who reveals the inexhaustible great treasure.

original: dbul po bsten pas bdag nyid dbul por 'gyur //
analyzed: dbul po bsten pas bdag nyid dbul por 'gyur //
translated: By relying on the poor, you yourself will become poor.

original: nam mkha' rgya mtsho nyi zla gsum ldan bsten //
analyzed: nam mkha' rgya mtsho nyi zla gsum ldan bsten //
translated: Rely on the sky, the ocean, and the three luminaries.

original: ne tso'i kha thon snyan pas ci zhig phan //
analyzed: ne tso'i kha thon snyan pas ci zhig phan //
translated: What benefit is there in the parrot‚Äôs pleasant recitations?

original: 'dab chags bu ni mkha' la 'phur na bde //
analyzed: 'dab chags bu ni mkha' la 'phur na bde //
translated: A bird is happy when it flies in the sky.

original: dud 'gro g-yang la bskyur na gson mi rung //
analyzed: dud 'gro g-yang la bskyur na gson mi rung //
translated: An animal cannot live if thrown into a ravine.

original: nyi zla gza' bral sprin rlung btab na gsal //
analyzed: nyi zla gza' bral sprin rlung btab na gsal //
translated: The sun and moon, free from eclipses, shine when the clouds and wind have passed.

original: sprin sangs rgyur kyang gzas zin snang ba med //
analyzed: sprin sangs rgyur kyang gzas zin snang ba med //
translated: Even when the clouds have cleared, there is no light when the sun and moon are eclipsed.

original: chu skyes padma'i bcud ni bung bas len //
analyzed: chu skyes padma'i bcud ni bung bas len //
translated: The essence of the lotus in the water is taken by the bee.

original: sha sbrang drung na gnas kyang de ltar min //
analyzed: sha sbrang drung na gnas kyang de ltar min //
translated: It is not like that for a flesh fly that stays nearby.

original: chu shel chu ni rkyen dang 'dzom pa gces //
analyzed: chu shel chu ni rkyen dang 'dzom pa gces //
translated: The water of the water crystal is precious when the conditions come together.

original: seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par min //
analyzed: seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par min //
translated: The milk of the lion is not in an ordinary bad vessel.

original: aom a'a: h'um ae ma ho //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ae ma ho //
translated: Om Ah Hum Emaho

original: snang srid thams cad nam mkha' nyid las byung //
analyzed: snang srid thams cad nam mkha' nyid las byung //
translated: All of appearance and existence arises from space itself.

original: nam mkha' yod med phyogs rgyu kha dog bral //
analyzed: nam mkha' yod med phyogs rgyu kha dog bral //
translated: Space is free from the directions, causes, and colors of existence and nonexistence.

original: thog ma bar dang tha ma 'gro 'ong med //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang tha ma 'gro 'ong med //
translated: It has no beginning, middle, or end, and no coming or going.

original: 'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs kyang 'gyur mi srid //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs kyang 'gyur mi srid //
translated: Even if the four elements are completely disturbed, it is impossible for it to change.

original: rkyen gyis dkar nag snang yang dkar nag med ;
analyzed: rkyen gyis dkar nag snang yang dkar nag med ;
translated: Although it appears as white and black due to conditions, it is neither white nor black.

original: / rgya mtsho gting zab rgya che sna tshogs 'char //
analyzed: / rgya mtsho gting zab rgya che sna tshogs 'char //
translated: The ocean arises as a variety, with a deep depth and vast extent.

original: dpa' rlabs ri bo 'dra yang rgya mtsho'i ngang //
analyzed: dpa' rlabs ri bo 'dra yang rgya mtsho'i ngang //
translated: The waves may be like mountains, but they are of the nature of the ocean.

original: chab rom brag 'dra chu las yongs ma 'das //
analyzed: chab rom brag 'dra chu las yongs ma 'das //
translated: The ice may be like rocks, but it does not go beyond being water.

original: sa la sna tshogs 'khrungs kyang zad pa med //
analyzed: sa la sna tshogs 'khrungs kyang zad pa med //
translated: The earth may give rise to a variety of things, but it is inexhaustible.

original: bsregs bcad bdar yang gser gyi ngo mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsregs bcad bdar yang gser gyi ngo mi 'gyur //
translated: It may be burned, cut, or rubbed, but the nature of gold does not change.

original: me ni tsha zhing chu ni rlan mi @150b 'bral ;
analyzed: me ni tsha zhing chu ni rlan mi @150b 'bral ;
translated: Fire is not separate from heat, and water is not separate from wetness.

original: / sprul pa drug ni rab tu rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: / sprul pa drug ni rab tu rtogs par gyis //
translated: Understand the six emanations.

original: nam mkha' stong las stong pa 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' stong las stong pa 'byung ba ste //
translated: From the empty sky, emptiness arises.

original: rkyen gyis me chu 'byung yang shel gyi ngo mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rkyen gyis me chu 'byung yang shel gyi ngo mi 'gyur //
translated: Though fire and water arise from conditions, the nature of crystal does not change.

original: bka' rtags phyag rgya gnyug ma zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bka' rtags phyag rgya gnyug ma zhes brjod do //
translated: This is called the innate mudrƒÅ of the Buddha's word.

original: sa 'og gser dang gyad kyi nor bu dang // dbul po'i gter dang bum pa'i mar me ltas //
analyzed: sa 'og gser dang gyad kyi nor bu dang // dbul po'i gter dang bum pa'i mar me ltas //
translated: Like gold under the earth, a strong man's jewel, a poor man's treasure, and a lamp in a vase,

original: nor bu rin chen mi gtsang 'dam du bying //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen mi gtsang 'dam du bying //
translated: A precious jewel sinks into filthy mud.

original: sgyu mar ma shes rgyal po aa thang chad //
analyzed: sgyu mar ma shes rgyal po aa thang chad //
translated: Not knowing it to be an illusion, the king is exhausted.

original: thag pa sbrul du mthong bas brgyal nas shi //
analyzed: thag pa sbrul du mthong bas brgyal nas shi //
translated: Seeing a rope as a snake, he faints and dies.

original: mar me nyi ma dmus long mun par snang //
analyzed: mar me nyi ma dmus long mun par snang //
translated: A lamp, the sun, and a blind man see darkness.

original: mi gtsang dri za tsandan dri la 'bros //
analyzed: mi gtsang dri za tsandan dri la 'bros //
translated: The smell of feces is mistaken for the scent of sandalwood.

original: mig skyon can gyis zla ba gnyis su mthong //
analyzed: mig skyon can gyis zla ba gnyis su mthong //
translated: Someone with an eye disease sees two moons.

original: glang po bzhag nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba //
analyzed: glang po bzhag nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba //
translated: Leaving the elephant, one searches for the elephant‚Äôs footprints.

original: bu chung me long gzugs brnyan mthong bas dga' //
analyzed: bu chung me long gzugs brnyan mthong bas dga' //
translated: A small child is delighted to see a reflection in a mirror.üîΩA deer in a mirage chases after a hallucinated pool of water.

original: ri dags 'khrul pa smig rgyu chu la snyeg / gser ma shes par gan phye ma 'chang //
analyzed: ri dags 'khrul pa smig rgyu chu la snyeg / gser ma shes par gan phye ma 'chang //
translated: Not knowing it is gold, one treats pyrite as worthless.

original: ko chu glang rjes chu ni myur du skam //
analyzed: ko chu glang rjes chu ni myur du skam //
translated: The water in an elephant‚Äôs footprint quickly dries up.

original: rkyal med pa dag rgya mtshor zhugs na 'bying //
analyzed: rkyal med pa dag rgya mtshor zhugs na 'bying //
translated: Those who are not swimmers drown when they enter the ocean.üîΩBlind people wandering on a road without a guide,

original: lam mkhan med par dmun long lam 'gro dang // 'dab gshog med pa'i bya dag 'phur na ltung //
analyzed: lam mkhan med par dmun long lam 'gro dang // 'dab gshog med pa'i bya dag 'phur na ltung //
translated: birds without wings fall when they fly,üîΩand poisonous plants regrown from their roots are even more toxic.

original: dug lo bregs nas bsgyur kyang ci zhig phan //
analyzed: dug lo bregs nas bsgyur kyang ci zhig phan //
translated: What good is it to cut the leaves of a poisonous plant?

original: mun khung dag tu sgron me bteg pas gsal //
analyzed: mun khung dag tu sgron me bteg pas gsal //
translated: A lamp held aloft illuminates the darkness.

original: thag pa gcig chod mdud pa brgya grol te //
analyzed: thag pa gcig chod mdud pa brgya grol te //
translated: When one knot is untied, the others come undone.

original: thag pa mes tshig dag gis 'ching mi nus //üîΩgser 'gyur rtsi yis zangs lcags gser du 'gyur //
analyzed: thag pa mes tshig dag gis 'ching mi nus // gser 'gyur rtsi yis zangs lcags gser du 'gyur //
translated: A rope burned in a fire cannot be used as a noose.üîΩThe elixir of alchemy turns copper and iron into gold.

original: rma byas btsan dug zos pas spu thog rgyas //
analyzed: rma byas btsan dug zos pas spu thog rgyas //
translated: A peacock‚Äôs feathers become resplendent when it eats poisonous plants.

original: mig dang ldan pas rkang pa gar gzhag phyin //
analyzed: mig dang ldan pas rkang pa gar gzhag phyin //
translated: One with eyes goes wherever his feet take him.

original: dbang gi rgyal po gcig la 'dod dgu rdzogs //
analyzed: dbang gi rgyal po gcig la 'dod dgu rdzogs //
translated: The king of power has everything he desires.

original: khyung phrug gshog rdzogs mkha' la 'phur na bde //
analyzed: khyung phrug gshog rdzogs mkha' la 'phur na bde //
translated: The garu·∏ça chick, with wings complete, flies happily in the sky.

original: mar me bteg pas mun pa'i lam gsal zhing //
analyzed: mar me bteg pas mun pa'i lam gsal zhing //
translated: The raised lamp illuminates the path in the dark.

original: cang shes sgrog tu bcug pa phye bas grol //
analyzed: cang shes sgrog tu bcug pa phye bas grol //
translated: The wise one, put in chains, is freed by opening the door.

original: ngang pa chu la 'o ma len pa ltos //
analyzed: ngang pa chu la 'o ma len pa ltos //
translated: Look at the goose that extracts milk from water.

original: dgra skugs btsal bas 'jigs pa sangs nas 'gro //
analyzed: dgra skugs btsal bas 'jigs pa sangs nas 'gro //
translated: The fear of searching for an enemy is cleared away and one goes.

original: nam mkha' ma mthong nam mkha' mthong ba ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' ma mthong nam mkha' mthong ba ste //
translated: Not seeing the sky is seeing the sky.

original: rgya dang rgya yi 'bur ni log par 'byung //
analyzed: rgya dang rgya yi 'bur ni log par 'byung //
translated: The seal and the seal‚Äôs impression arise in reverse.

original: mar me bsad pas lus dang grib ma med //
analyzed: mar me bsad pas lus dang grib ma med //
translated: The extinguished lamp has no body or shadow.

original: sgyu ma bshig pas 'du shes rnam lnga spangs //
analyzed: sgyu ma bshig pas 'du shes rnam lnga spangs //
translated: The destroyed illusion abandons the five perceptions.

original: chu la chu bzhag de nyid dbyer med 'gyur //
analyzed: chu la chu bzhag de nyid dbyer med 'gyur //
translated: Water placed in water becomes indistinguishable.

original: nam mkha'i me tog ri bong rva zhes bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog ri bong rva zhes bya //
translated: The sky flower and the rabbit‚Äôs horns are said to be so.üîΩThe bird that flies to the horizon returns.

original: gzings la 'phur ba'i bya ni slar la ldog / gang zhig chab rom spangs nas chu tshol ba //üîΩrgyu rkyen rtsol @151a * //
analyzed: gzings la 'phur ba'i bya ni slar la ldog / gang zhig chab rom spangs nas chu tshol ba //üîΩrgyu rkyen rtsol @151a * //
translated: One who abandons ice and seeks water

original: bas byas pa rang 'byung min //
analyzed: bas byas pa rang 'byung min //
translated: and is not self-produced.üîΩIt is a mistake to seal the poor with the great seal of wealth,

original: dbul po mi nor rgya yis 'debs pa dang // sa bon 'bras bu tha dad 'dzin pa 'khrul //
analyzed: dbul po mi nor rgya yis 'debs pa dang // sa bon 'bras bu tha dad 'dzin pa 'khrul //
translated: and to hold the seed and the fruit as different.

original: rkun ma ngos ma zin par rab mda' sbren  //
analyzed: rkun ma ngos ma zin par rab mda' sbren  //
translated: The thief is not recognized, but the arrow is shot.

original: kye ma 'di ni sprul dang rig sngags mtshon cha 'dra //
analyzed: kye ma 'di ni sprul dang rig sngags mtshon cha 'dra //
translated: Alas! This is like a snake and a spell.

original: rta rngas sprul la mdud pa brgya ba pa grol ;
analyzed: rta rngas sprul la mdud pa brgya ba pa grol ;
translated: The snake is bound by a hundred knots in the horsehair rope.

original: / mkha' la mdung bskor las zin skyes bu bde //
analyzed: / mkha' la mdung bskor las zin skyes bu bde //
translated: The man who has finished his work is happy, whirling his spear in the sky.

original: khyud chen mkha' lding nyam nga 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: khyud chen mkha' lding nyam nga 'jigs pa med //
translated: The great garu·∏ça soars in the sky, without fear or terror.

original: ri mtho'i kha na yul khams sna tshogs gsal //
analyzed: ri mtho'i kha na yul khams sna tshogs gsal //
translated: From the top of the high mountain, the various countries are clearly seen.

original: bu yi sdug bsngal ma yis mthong mi bzod //
analyzed: bu yi sdug bsngal ma yis mthong mi bzod //
translated: The mother cannot bear to see the suffering of her child.

original: ral gri ngar mas dngos po ma lus gcod //
analyzed: ral gri ngar mas dngos po ma lus gcod //
translated: The sharp sword cuts all things without exception.

original: smyon par gyur kyang dug la reg mi byed //
analyzed: smyon par gyur kyang dug la reg mi byed //
translated: Even if one has gone mad, one should not touch poison.

original: bu chung yin yang gtsug gi nor mi 'bral //
analyzed: bu chung yin yang gtsug gi nor mi 'bral //
translated: Even if one is a small child, one should not part with the crest jewel.üîΩA·∏• o·πÉ h≈´·πÉ.

original: a'a: aom h'um /üîΩae ma ho //üîΩme don gnyer bas du ba shugs kyis 'byung //
analyzed: a'a: aom h'um / ae ma ho // me don gnyer bas du ba shugs kyis 'byung //
translated: Emaho!üîΩThe one who seeks fire will find smoke.

original: nor bu rnyed na so nam 'bad mi dgos //
analyzed: nor bu rnyed na so nam 'bad mi dgos //
translated: When one has found the jewel, one does not need to exert oneself in agriculture.

original: mi gcig skyes pas shing la 'dod lnga 'byung //
analyzed: mi gcig skyes pas shing la 'dod lnga 'byung //
translated: A man is born, and the five objects of desire appear in the trees.

original: skyur po zos na mthong bas nyams su myong//
analyzed: skyur po zos na mthong bas nyams su myong//
translated: If you eat sour food, you experience it by seeing.

original: sngar 'dris mi dang phrad na the tshom med //
analyzed: sngar 'dris mi dang phrad na the tshom med //
translated: If you meet a person you knew before, there is no doubt.

original: skyes bu nam mkhas bzung ba thar mi srid //
analyzed: skyes bu nam mkhas bzung ba thar mi srid //
translated: A person held by space will not be liberated.

original: rmi lam sgyu ma'i mtshon gyis gnod pa med //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu ma'i mtshon gyis gnod pa med //
translated: A dream or an illusion cannot be harmed by a weapon.

original: dngul rdo'o ma bur shing til mar ltos //
analyzed: dngul rdo'o ma bur shing til mar ltos //
translated: Look at silver ore, sugar cane, sesame, and oil.

original: chu ni mthong dang thos pas skom mi sel //
analyzed: chu ni mthong dang thos pas skom mi sel //
translated: Water is not removed by seeing or hearing it.

original: sman pa'i ngag mi nyan pa'i nad pa de //
analyzed: sman pa'i ngag mi nyan pa'i nad pa de //
translated: A patient who does not listen to the doctor's words

original: zas nor byin pas rang nyid bkres nas shi //
analyzed: zas nor byin pas rang nyid bkres nas shi //
translated: starves to death after giving away food and wealth.

original: gter mdzod bgrangs pas rang gis thob pa med //
analyzed: gter mdzod bgrangs pas rang gis thob pa med //
translated: Counting a treasure house does not bring one's own gain.

original: 'on pa sil snyan long ba ri mo mkhan //
analyzed: 'on pa sil snyan long ba ri mo mkhan //
translated: A deaf person is a musician, a blind person is a painter.

original: byis pa mna' gtam dmus long yul khams ston //
analyzed: byis pa mna' gtam dmus long yul khams ston //
translated: A child is a witness, a blind person shows the country.

original: sgo nga ma yis gab na bye'u phrug smin //
analyzed: sgo nga ma yis gab na bye'u phrug smin //
translated: If an egg is hidden by the mother, the chicks will mature.

original: rdo la bzhu btul byas na rin chen nor //
analyzed: rdo la bzhu btul byas na rin chen nor //
translated: If you melt and refine stone, you will get precious jewels.

original: spang ma mnan nas bsings pas gar chang 'byung //
analyzed: spang ma mnan nas bsings pas gar chang 'byung //
translated: By pressing down on the grass, beer and chang will come.

original: bu chung gsos pas dpa' bo'i las rnams nus //
analyzed: bu chung gsos pas dpa' bo'i las rnams nus //
translated: By raising a child, one is able to do the work of a hero.

original: rgyal bu tshar nas yul khams dbang thob ste //
analyzed: rgyal bu tshar nas yul khams dbang thob ste //
translated: When the prince has grown up and taken over the kingdom,

original: mkha' la sprin dengs 'khyags pa chur thim 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' la sprin dengs 'khyags pa chur thim 'gyur //
translated: the clouds in the sky will disperse and the ice will melt into water.

original: mkha' lding rgyal po spro bsdu med par gnas //
analyzed: mkha' lding rgyal po spro bsdu med par gnas //
translated: The king of the garu·∏ças remains without expanding or contracting.

original: chu ni ma rnyogs rang dangs nyid du zhog / ji ltar mkhas pas ba lang skyong ba bzhin //
analyzed: chu ni ma rnyogs rang dangs nyid du zhog / ji ltar mkhas pas ba lang skyong ba bzhin //
translated: Like a skilled cow herder, let the water be unmuddied and naturally clear.

original: brtan gsal rno ba mar mo'i snying po ltos //
analyzed: brtan gsal rno ba mar mo'i snying po ltos //
translated: Look at the core of the lamp, stable, clear, and sharp.

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu chags zhen rtsis gdab med //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu chags zhen rtsis gdab med //
translated: An illusory person has no attachment, clinging, or concern.

original: bya ni nam mkhar rten med gnas par byed //
analyzed: bya ni nam mkhar rten med gnas par byed //
translated: A bird makes its abode in the sky without support.

original: tshogs ma rnams kyis ras gos dag par bkru //
analyzed: tshogs ma rnams kyis ras gos dag par bkru //
translated: The assembly of women wash their cotton clothes clean.

original: mkhar spe rtsig na 'gram gzhi @151b legs par thing //
analyzed: mkhar spe rtsig na 'gram gzhi @151b legs par thing //
translated: When building a castle, dig the foundation well.

original: ma yi sdug bsngal bu yis mthong bar gyis //
analyzed: ma yi sdug bsngal bu yis mthong bar gyis //
translated: Let the son see the suffering of the mother.

original: yid bzhin nor bu spyi bo'i gcug tu bzhag / nam mkha' lta na 'ja' tshon lus su bsgyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu spyi bo'i gcug tu bzhag / nam mkha' lta na 'ja' tshon lus su bsgyur //
translated: Place the wish-fulfilling jewel on the crown of one‚Äôs head; when looking at the sky, transform the rainbow into one‚Äôs body.

original: dmu rgod rta ni thabs kyis zung la 'tshos //
analyzed: dmu rgod rta ni thabs kyis zung la 'tshos //
translated: Tame the wild horse with a method and ride it.

original: ri gzar 'bab chu yang yang brdabs na drungs //
analyzed: ri gzar 'bab chu yang yang brdabs na drungs //
translated: If you repeatedly strike the waterfall on a steep mountain, you will reach the bottom.

original: spre'u zin na kun la yang rtsal sbyang //
analyzed: spre'u zin na kun la yang rtsal sbyang //
translated: If one is seized by a monkey, one should train in all.

original: bsags pa'i yo byad chags med kun la sbyin //
analyzed: bsags pa'i yo byad chags med kun la sbyin //
translated: One should give to all without attachment the accumulated provisions.

original: bying zhing rmugs na 'dab chags mkha' la spur //
analyzed: bying zhing rmugs na 'dab chags mkha' la spur //
translated: If one is sinking and dull, one should fly like a bird in the sky.

original: yang na bum pa kha sbyor rlung gis khong //
analyzed: yang na bum pa kha sbyor rlung gis khong //
translated: Or else, one should fill the vase with the wind of union.

original: rgod na khong stong rkun ma sprin la ltos //
analyzed: rgod na khong stong rkun ma sprin la ltos //
translated: If one is agitated, one should look at the empty belly, the thief, and the clouds.

original: rgya mtsho'i dpa' rlabs chu zlar shes par bya //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i dpa' rlabs chu zlar shes par bya //
translated: One should understand the ocean waves as the moon in water.

original: rkun ma mthong zhing tshor na ldog par nges //
analyzed: rkun ma mthong zhing tshor na ldog par nges //
translated: If one sees and feels the thief, one will certainly turn back.

original: rtsa ba sman na thams cad sman zhes bya //
analyzed: rtsa ba sman na thams cad sman zhes bya //
translated: If one has the medicine of the root, one should say, ‚ÄúAll is medicine.‚Äù

original: nor bu rin chen sa yi gter du sba //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen sa yi gter du sba //
translated: One should bury the precious jewel as a treasure in the earth.

original: yang na ri dags gsar song der la gsod //
analyzed: yang na ri dags gsar song der la gsod //
translated: Or else, one should kill the deer that is newly gone to the pass.

original: ltogs na dug la sngags kyis btab la bza' //
analyzed: ltogs na dug la sngags kyis btab la bza' //
translated: If one is hungry, one should eat poison that is empowered with mantra.

original: snyoms las byis pa'i nyam nga g-yang sa ltos //
analyzed: snyoms las byis pa'i nyam nga g-yang sa ltos //
translated: If one is lazy, one should look at the abyss of danger for children.

original: snying la gces pa dur khrod gnas su skyol //
analyzed: snying la gces pa dur khrod gnas su skyol //
translated: One should take to the charnel ground that which is dear to the heart.

original: na tsha byung na rkyal pa stong par gyis //
analyzed: na tsha byung na rkyal pa stong par gyis //
translated: If one has an illness, one should make a hollow space.

original: de la bug thod la mes tshig me la gdungs //
analyzed: de la bug thod la mes tshig me la gdungs //
translated: One should warm the opening of the hollow space with fire.

original: sman ma zhu na slar yang nad du 'gyur //
analyzed: sman ma zhu na slar yang nad du 'gyur //
translated: If the medicine is not digested, it will again become an illness.

original: rtsa dang gser gnyis 'ching byed khyad par med //
analyzed: rtsa dang gser gnyis 'ching byed khyad par med //
translated: There is no difference between a rope and gold as far as binding is concerned.

original: shes pa 'thums na yul khams skor zhing blta //
analyzed: shes pa 'thums na yul khams skor zhing blta //
translated: If your mind is dull, travel around and look at the countryside.

original: rkang 'gros bul na 'og rta rol la spos //
analyzed: rkang 'gros bul na 'og rta rol la spos //
translated: If your walking is slow, ride a horse.

original: dpa' rtsal zhen na dpa' rtsal kun la sbyang //
analyzed: dpa' rtsal zhen na dpa' rtsal kun la sbyang //
translated: If you are attached to your skills, train in all skills.

original: me don gnyer bas gtsub shing drag tu gtsubs //
analyzed: me don gnyer bas gtsub shing drag tu gtsubs //
translated: If you want fire, rub the sticks vigorously.

original: ri bo mi bskyod chu bo rgyun chad med //
analyzed: ri bo mi bskyod chu bo rgyun chad med //
translated: A mountain is unshakable, and a river is uninterrupted.

original: gser gling phyin nas sa rdo btsal mi rnyed //
analyzed: gser gling phyin nas sa rdo btsal mi rnyed //
translated: If you go to an island of gold, you will not find any earth or stones.

original: shing bral 'dab ma shin du yang la sogs //
analyzed: shing bral 'dab ma shin du yang la sogs //
translated: A leaf that is free from a tree is very light.

original: yid bzhin nor bu yod na dgos 'dod 'byung //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu yod na dgos 'dod 'byung //
translated: If you have a wish-fulfilling gem, you will obtain all that you desire.üîΩA: A: OM HUM

original: a'a: aom h'um /üîΩae ma ho //
analyzed: a'a: aom h'um / ae ma ho //
translated: Amazing!

original: bya 'phur nam mkha' dag las mi 'da' ste //
analyzed: bya 'phur nam mkha' dag las mi 'da' ste //
translated: A bird does not fly beyond the sky;

original: sna tshogs nor bu tshon gyi kha dog snang //
analyzed: sna tshogs nor bu tshon gyi kha dog snang //
translated: a multicolored jewel reflects various colors;

original: gser dang gser gyi rgyan la 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: gser dang gser gyi rgyan la 'gyur ba med //
translated: gold and gold ornaments do not change;

original: 'dam skyes padma 'dam gyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'dam skyes padma 'dam gyis mi gos so //
translated: a lotus in the mud is not soiled by the mud.

original: gang dag 'jigs sar skyel ma sangs nas 'gro //
analyzed: gang dag 'jigs sar skyel ma sangs nas 'gro //
translated: Those who are escorted safely through a dangerous place go on their way.

original: rgyal po gang zhig rgyal srid bor nas 'khyam //
analyzed: rgyal po gang zhig rgyal srid bor nas 'khyam //
translated: A king who wanders after giving up his kingdom

original: sum cu rtsa gsum thos pa ne tsho'i chos //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum thos pa ne tsho'i chos //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three are like parrots in their understanding of the Dharma.

original: chu la mar khu blugs pas 'dres pa min //
analyzed: chu la mar khu blugs pas 'dres pa min //
translated: It is not like mixing butter with water.

original: bya rgod rnyis zin glang chen 'dam du bying //
analyzed: bya rgod rnyis zin glang chen 'dam du bying //
translated: An eagle caught in a snare and an elephant stuck in the mud,

original: nor bu rin chen lung khung dag tu bor //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen lung khung dag tu bor //
translated: a precious jewel thrown into a ravine,

original: rgyal blon 'dzom na rgyal srid mnga' thang 'phel //
analyzed: rgyal blon 'dzom na rgyal srid mnga' thang 'phel //
translated: when the king and his minister are together, the kingdom prospers.

original: mig dang @152a * //
analyzed: mig dang @152a * //
translated: When you have eyes

original: rkang par ldan pas don sar phyin //
analyzed: rkang par ldan pas don sar phyin //
translated: and feet, you can go to the place of your goal.

original: dpa' bo'i go mtshon blon po bka' rtags khyer //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i go mtshon blon po bka' rtags khyer //
translated: A hero‚Äôs armor and weapons are carried by his minister as a sign of his authority.

original: rtsis med smyon pa zhen med bu chung dang // rtog med phrag dang glang chen chur 'jug ltos //
analyzed: rtsis med smyon pa zhen med bu chung dang // rtog med phrag dang glang chen chur 'jug ltos //
translated: Look at the madman who has no regard for anything, the child who has no attachments, the one who is free of concepts, and the elephant who enters the water.

original: phrag rgod rnams ni dug sprul mi gtong za //
analyzed: phrag rgod rnams ni dug sprul mi gtong za //
translated: The haughty ones are like poisonous snakes that cannot be released.

original: dbul po rin chen rgyal po'i mkhar du sba //
analyzed: dbul po rin chen rgyal po'i mkhar du sba //
translated: The poor are like precious jewels hidden in the king‚Äôs palace.

original: gso sbyong spyad rnams rig pa mda' yis bsnun //
analyzed: gso sbyong spyad rnams rig pa mda' yis bsnun //
translated: Those who practice the purification fast are struck down by the arrow of knowledge.

original: yul khams kun gyi dgra rnams srid du gcad //
analyzed: yul khams kun gyi dgra rnams srid du gcad //
translated: All the enemies of the kingdom are to be killed.

original: dpa' bo gang yin de yis dgra rnams 'dul //
analyzed: dpa' bo gang yin de yis dgra rnams 'dul //
translated: The hero is the one who tames the enemies.

original: mkha' lding rgyal po phye leb spyod yul min //
analyzed: mkha' lding rgyal po phye leb spyod yul min //
translated: The king of the garu·∏ças is not the domain of the butterfly.

original: rigs ngan rgyal po wa yis seng lpags gyon //
analyzed: rigs ngan rgyal po wa yis seng lpags gyon //
translated: A vile king, wearing a lion's skin, is like a fox.

original: nags la me mched gdong du gar bab sreg / me 'bar ba la rlung gis bskyod na 'bar //
analyzed: nags la me mched gdong du gar bab sreg / me 'bar ba la rlung gis bskyod na 'bar //
translated: A forest fire burns whatever it encounters.

original: rin chen snod sbyar mi gtsang phyis pa sangs //
analyzed: rin chen snod sbyar mi gtsang phyis pa sangs //
translated: A precious vessel, when cleaned, is purified.

original: smyon pa bu chung khyi phag seng ge bzhin //üîΩa'a: aom h'um /
analyzed: smyon pa bu chung khyi phag seng ge bzhin // a'a: aom h'um /
translated: A madman, a child, a dog, and a pig are like a lion.üîΩA: A: OM HUM

original: ae ma ho //
analyzed: ae ma ho //
translated: Emaho!üîΩAll waters are one in the great ocean.

original: chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho chen por gcig / gang zhig ltogs pa'i dus su zas ster ba //
analyzed: chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho chen por gcig / gang zhig ltogs pa'i dus su zas ster ba //
translated: He who gives food when one is hungry,

original: nad rnams gso ba sman pa'i rgyal po ste //
analyzed: nad rnams gso ba sman pa'i rgyal po ste //
translated: the king of physicians who cures illnesses,üîΩthe supreme boatman who liberates from great rivers,

original: chu bo chen po sgrol ba'i mnyen pa mchog / gnod pa'i dgra rnams 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ste //
analyzed: chu bo chen po sgrol ba'i mnyen pa mchog / gnod pa'i dgra rnams 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ste //
translated: the hero who tames harmful enemies,

original: dge bshes rgyal po phyogs med kun la snyoms //
analyzed: dge bshes rgyal po phyogs med kun la snyoms //
translated: the king of spiritual friends, impartial and even-minded toward all,

original: mkhas pa dag gis 'ja' tshon blta bar bya //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag gis 'ja' tshon blta bar bya //
translated: the wise ones should look at the rainbow.

original: gnad du bsnun pa'i tshor ba spangs pa med //
analyzed: gnad du bsnun pa'i tshor ba spangs pa med //
translated: There is no avoiding the pain of being struck to the quick.

original: bung ba me tog dag la chags zhen bral //
analyzed: bung ba me tog dag la chags zhen bral //
translated: A bee is free from attachment to flowers.

original: nya ni rtag tu chu las yong mi 'da' //
analyzed: nya ni rtag tu chu las yong mi 'da' //
translated: A fish never strays from the water.

original: rtsi sman yod kyang dug la reg mi byed //
analyzed: rtsi sman yod kyang dug la reg mi byed //
translated: Even if there is medicine, do not touch poison.

original: ji ltar phyug po so nam byed pa ltos //
analyzed: ji ltar phyug po so nam byed pa ltos //
translated: Look how the rich do farming.

original: seng ge'i 'o ma lkugs pa'i kha bzhin bsdam //
analyzed: seng ge'i 'o ma lkugs pa'i kha bzhin bsdam //
translated: Like a mute's tasting of food, keep it to yourself.

original: smyon pas rang gi snying la mtshon bsnun dang // gshed mas zin pa'i chad pas bcad pa'i mi //
analyzed: smyon pas rang gi snying la mtshon bsnun dang // gshed mas zin pa'i chad pas bcad pa'i mi //
translated: Like a madman stabbing his own heart, or a man being executed by the king's order,

original: sa bon rul pa myu gu yong mi skye //
analyzed: sa bon rul pa myu gu yong mi skye //
translated: A rotten seed will not produce a sprout.

original: tshe lo sum cu nyi shu bcu pa bzhin //
analyzed: tshe lo sum cu nyi shu bcu pa bzhin //
translated: Like the lifespan of thirty, twenty, or ten years.

original: gang zhig ye shes nyi ma shar nas nub //
analyzed: gang zhig ye shes nyi ma shar nas nub //
translated: Those who, after the sun of wisdom has risen, set,

original: dbul pos nor bu rin chen rnyed nas bor //
analyzed: dbul pos nor bu rin chen rnyed nas bor //
translated: Like a poor man who finds a precious jewel and then loses it,

original: gang dag cang shes rta la zhon nas 'bab //
analyzed: gang dag cang shes rta la zhon nas 'bab //
translated: Those who, having mounted the horse of knowledge, fall off,

original: ji ltar dbul po'i nor bu rgyal pos phrogs //
analyzed: ji ltar dbul po'i nor bu rgyal pos phrogs //
translated: Like a king stealing a poor man's jewel,

original: yid bzhin nor bu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung //
translated: If you worship the wish-fulfilling jewel, your needs and desires are fulfilled.

original: dngul dkar me long yang yang phyis na gsal //
analyzed: dngul dkar me long yang yang phyis na gsal //
translated: If you polish a white silver mirror again and again, it becomes clear.

original: brgya byin lha yi longs spyod 'bad pa med //
analyzed: brgya byin lha yi longs spyod 'bad pa med //
translated: Indra's divine enjoyments are effortless.

original: me tog padma bung ba'i tshogs rnams 'du //
analyzed: me tog padma bung ba'i tshogs rnams 'du //
translated: A flock of bees gathers around a flower.üîΩA: O·πÉ h≈´·πÉ.

original: a'a: aom h'um /üîΩae ma ho //
analyzed: a'a: aom h'um /üîΩae ma ho //
translated: Emaho!

original: po ta la la @152b nam langs nyi shar mnyam //
analyzed: po ta la la @152b nam langs nyi shar mnyam //
translated: The Potala is like the sun rising at dawn.

original: 'jim pa'i logs la btab pa'i bde gshegs sku //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i logs la btab pa'i bde gshegs sku //
translated: The body of the Sugata carved in clay

original: myu gu me tog 'bras bu rim gyis smin //
analyzed: myu gu me tog 'bras bu rim gyis smin //
translated: ripens in stages, like a sprout, a flower, and a fruit.

original: dbang po skyon dang bral na gzugs rnams mthong //
analyzed: dbang po skyon dang bral na gzugs rnams mthong //
translated: If the senses are free from defects, forms are seen.

original: shel gong dri ma med pa'i phyi nang gsal //
analyzed: shel gong dri ma med pa'i phyi nang gsal //
translated: The inside and outside of a clear crystal are luminous.

original: sgyu ma mkhan gyis mkhas pa sna tshogs ston //
analyzed: sgyu ma mkhan gyis mkhas pa sna tshogs ston //
translated: A magician displays various skills.

original: rdo rje pha lam gang gis gzhom par min //
analyzed: rdo rje pha lam gang gis gzhom par min //
translated: A diamond cannot be destroyed by anything.

original: yid bzhin nor bus mi mthun gnod pa sel //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bus mi mthun gnod pa sel //
translated: A wish-fulfilling jewel removes all unfavorable harm.

original: seng ge mngal rgya khyung phrug gong rgya bral //
analyzed: seng ge mngal rgya khyung phrug gong rgya bral //
translated: A lion cub is free from the womb and a garu·∏ça chick from the egg.

original: mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer phyogs bcur khyab //
analyzed: mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer phyogs bcur khyab //
translated: When the sun rises in the sky, its rays pervade the ten directions.

original: srin bu bung ba gnas gyur mkha' la 'phyo //
analyzed: srin bu bung ba gnas gyur mkha' la 'phyo //
translated: A worm becomes a bee and flies in the sky.

original: yid bzhin nor bu rtog med dgos 'dod 'byung /
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu rtog med dgos 'dod 'byung /
translated: A wish-fulfilling jewel, without thought, produces what is needed and desired.

original: rang gis grib ma mthong bas 'bros pa dang // ri dags smig rgyu rnyed pa nor ba ste //
analyzed: rang gis grib ma mthong bas 'bros pa dang // ri dags smig rgyu rnyed pa nor ba ste //
translated: Seeing one‚Äôs own shadow, one flees; a deer mistakes a mirage for water;

original: dgra la zin du mthong na nges par gsod //
analyzed: dgra la zin du mthong na nges par gsod //
translated: if one sees an enemy, one is sure to be killed.

original: 'khyag pa'i rang bzhin chu ru shes par byos //
analyzed: 'khyag pa'i rang bzhin chu ru shes par byos //
translated: Know that the nature of ice is water.

original: nyi zla'i ngos la 'char nub gsal 'grib med //
analyzed: nyi zla'i ngos la 'char nub gsal 'grib med //
translated: There is no rising or setting on the sun and moon, no illumination or obscuration.

original: rin chen byi dor byas na dgos 'dod 'byung //
analyzed: rin chen byi dor byas na dgos 'dod 'byung //
translated: When the precious [earth] is polished, needs and desires are fulfilled.

original: ae ma ho //
analyzed: ae ma ho //
translated: Amazing!

original: de ltar bstan pa'i don de thams cad kyang //
analyzed: de ltar bstan pa'i don de thams cad kyang //
translated: All of these topics that have been taught

original: rang bzhin las dang 'bras bu gsum du gnas //
analyzed: rang bzhin las dang 'bras bu gsum du gnas //
translated: are present as the triad of nature, path, and result.

original: gzhi la chos sku lhun gyis grub pa na //
analyzed: gzhi la chos sku lhun gyis grub pa na //
translated: Since the dharmakƒÅya is spontaneously present in the basis,

original: de phyir sku gsum lhun gyis grub par gnas //
analyzed: de phyir sku gsum lhun gyis grub par gnas //
translated: therefore, the three kƒÅyas are present as spontaneous presence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo //
translated: The nature is the door of liberation of emptiness;

original: lam ni mtshan med rnam par thar pa'i sgo ;
analyzed: lam ni mtshan med rnam par thar pa'i sgo ;
translated: the path is the door of liberation of signlessness;

original: /'bras bu smon med rnam par thar pa'i sgo //
analyzed: /'bras bu smon med rnam par thar pa'i sgo //
translated: and the result is the door of liberation of aspirationlessness.

original: sgo gsum phyed pas sku gsum zhal mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo gsum phyed pas sku gsum zhal mthong 'gyur //
translated: Since the three doors are opened, the three kƒÅyas are seen.

original: 'on kyang thams cad brdzun pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: 'on kyang thams cad brdzun pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: However, since everything is false by nature,

original: don la ched du bya ba ci yang med //
analyzed: don la ched du bya ba ci yang med //
translated: in reality, there is nothing to be done.üîΩYou should understand these extremely secret vajra words

original: shin tu gsang ba rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag / khyod kyis ye shes rigs pas rtogs par gyis//
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag / khyod kyis ye shes rigs pas rtogs par gyis//
translated: with the reasoning of wisdom.

original: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan ma dang / padma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu brda brgyud gsang ba'i sgron ma rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan ma dang / padma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu brda brgyud gsang ba'i sgron ma rdzogs so//
translated: The glorious Shavaripa, the dakini Jnanadakini, and Padmasambhava composed this vajra song of the great seal, the secret lamp of the symbolic lineage, on the meaning of the essence in the form of a song.
